pages.text: Who asked, `Are you indeed of those who accept
When we are dead and have become dust and bones, shall we then be brought to justice
Another (person in Paradise) will say, "Will you have a look
Then he looked down and saw him (companion on earth of the man in Paradise) in the ignominy of Hell
He will say, "By Allah! You had almost ruined me
And had it not been for the largesse of my Lord, I should have been among those brought there
Are we to have no death
Except for our previous death!? And are we not to be punished
This indeed is the highest success
For the like of this, then, let the people do their work
Is this better as hospitable reception or Zaqqum, the tree of Hell
We have indeed made it [Zaqqum] a calamity for the wicked people
It is a tree that springs up at the bottom of Hell
Its shoots repulsive as devils' heads
Then indeed they will eat therefrom and fill their bellies therewith
Then indeed for them thereupon will there be a drink made of boiling water. a
Then indeed their return shall be to the Hell
They indeed had found their fathers astray
So they hasten to follow in their (fathers') footsteps
And most of the ancient peoples did go astray before them
And We did send warners among them
Then see what end those warned met with
Except for those who devotedly worship Allah alone
And Noah did certainly call out to Us, and how excellent was our response
And We saved him and the people with him from the great grief
